section.title: Introduction
section.para: The Spring Social TripIt project is an extension to Spring Social that enables integration with TripIt.

TripIt is a social network that links together travelers. By connecting with other travelers, you can keep in touch with contacts when your travel plans coincide. Also, aside from its social aspects, TripIt is a rather useful service for managing one's travel information.

Spring Social TripIt enables integration with TripIt with TripItConnectionFactory, a connection factory that can be plugged into Spring Social's service provider connection framework, and with an API binding to TripIt's REST API.

Note that Spring Social TripIt may release on a different schedule than Spring Social. Consequently, Spring Social's version may differ from that of Spring Social TripIt.
